readable.title: 2553188198_da1123a723
readable.content: A black dog crosses a puddle of water with a ball in its mouth while a brown dog looks the other way . A black dog runs through water carrying a ball in its mouth whilst a brown dog looks away . A brown and white dog walking away from a black and brown dog with a tennis ball in its mouth while standing in water . Two dogs playing with a ball in a puddle . Two dogs stand in a puddle , and one has a yellow tennis ball .
